function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Tourists' expressions of conservative attitudes may impact their behavior in ways that increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases in tourism contexts.","Mitigation":"Implementing stringent health and safety measures, providing clear guidelines, and promoting responsible behavior among tourists.","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, contact tracing apps, and communication technologies for disseminating guidelines.","People":"Tourists, tourism industry workers, local residents in tourist destinations.","Owner":"Tourism industry, public health authorities, local governments."}]}
